legislation: Criminal Justice and Immigration Bill 2006-07 then 2007-08
description: Letter dated 22/04/2008 from Lord Hunt of Kings Heath to Baroness Falkner of Margravine and others regarding the use of custody in the youth justice system in the context of the Criminal Justice and Immigration Bill. Incl. letter of 10/03/2008 to Baroness Stern and annexes. 11 p.
